statements: DELETE FROM mining_activities WHERE user_id = 123 AND activity_type = 'gold mining';
DELETE FROM mining_activities WHERE user_id = 123 AND activity_type = 'exploration';
DELETE FROM mining_activities WHERE activity_id = 100 AND miner_id = 10;
DELETE FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND miner_id = 20;
DELETE FROM miners WHERE miner_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM miners WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM mining_activities WHERE block_number > 1000 AND reward < 500.00;
DELETE FROM miners WHERE country = 'USA' AND mining_power < 1000.00;
DELETE FROM Miners WHERE company_id = 1 AND mining_power > 50;
